The best portion being a sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs. Mary Steed, in the City of Exon, November 16th, 1699 ... / by T.W. a lover of peace and truth. Whinnell, Thomas, fl. 1699.
[4], 34 p.
Printed by Sam. Darker and Sam. Farley, and are to be sold by H. Chaulklin, Bookseller in Taunton, and at Joshua Mechœ's ... in Exon, Exon : [1699?]
Running title: An intrest [sic] in God the best portion. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
=======
